snippet.title: Pioneers of Pagonia - Official Mining Update Trailer | OTK Games Expo 2024
snippet.description:
Get another look at Pioneers of Pagonia in this latest trailer for the medieval-fantasy city-builder game. The trailer showcases your objectives, threats you'll face, gameplay, and more. Pioneers of Pagonia is available now in Steam Early Access, and the mining update, which features new resources and more, arrives on June 24, 2024. In Pioneers of Pagonia, players set out into a world of countless islands to find lost tribes, help each other, and overcome the challenges together.

#Gaming #GameTrailers #Games
